-   Guest Speaker: Officer Mitchell Favor - Neighborhood Resource Officer

    -   ROs serve for 4 years, Mitchell has been in position for 1 year
    -   Responsibilities: Patrol area, social work, coordinate events in area
    -   Neighborhood Updates:
        -   Focused mainly on 7 Oaks area (60% of calls in Badger Rock Area)
        -   Neighborhood mainly has calls for Domestic Disputes and Mental Health checks
        -   Uptick in car thefts along Moorland Road - ensure vehicles are locked, do not leave keys in car. Cars taken while the owner leaves them unattended while running them to warm up.
    -   Attendee Concerns
        -   Traffic Enforcement - officers Charles Warren and Greg Rosetti stationed near neighborhood, any infrastructure change needs to go through City Engineering
        -   For immediate and specific concerns, reach out to Officer Favor; for general patterns please reach out to relevant department (i.e. traffic issues to traffic enforcement)
        -   Officer Favor has access to a grill and possibly funds to help with neighborhood summer picnic!
